author: James Tanner
method: Place the tuna, onion, mustard and sesame seeds into a bowl and mix well. Using your hands, mould the mixture into a patty. Heat the oil in a frying pan over a medium-high heat and fry the patty for 1-2 minutes on each side, or until cooked to your liking. To serve, place the tuna burger onto a serving plate.
ingredients: 55g/2oz tuna steak, finely chopped,  Â¼ onion, finely chopped,  1 tsp Dijon mustard,  1 tsp sesame seeds,  2 tsp olive oil
